000: This is in the park. Everywhere you look there are remains of the industry. Bridges crossing the stream, fundaments of factories, small railways.
001: The water tower of the paper factory
011: This was all there was to see.
002: From a distance it looked quite promising.
003: Here there are also thieces scraping the last pieces of remaining metal from the factory buildings
004: Above in the water tower. Magnificent view.
006: The watertower, view to the surroundings.
007: Downstairs in the paper factory, very old rolls of paper.
008: A basket with lumps, it has wheels with which it can drive along rails. At the left a big chunk of funghi paper.
